## IBoundedElement.getBoundingRectangle() method

Returns the coordinates of a bounded element describing the dimensions of the element. Coordinate system: workspace coordinates.  Object with coordinates of the bounded element.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getBoundingRectangle(): Rect;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Rect
